name: [layer] Examples (Bravo Studio)
description:
No tutorial for this one!

Some tips for layer tags:

  • Always use the iPhone 11 Pro Max for your design if possible (it's the most reliable size for responsive designs in Bravo)
  • The position is calculated by percentage of the screen height of your design!
  • Always calculate padding to the bottom for users with phones that display a navigation bar on top of apps (Bravo calculates with the full screen size, so otherwise it's overlapping your design)


Also check out the official guide: https://www.notion.so/Layer-sticky-element-d2d408d6479f44f887999dc84ca24062


Reach out to me on YouTube if you have further questions :)
